reference_summary:
Getting Into the Vortex: The Law of Attraction in Action, Episode XII
Esther Hicks  (Actor),     Jerry Hicks  (Actor, Director)    Rated:    PG    Format: DVD-ROM  This title is manufactured on demand using DVD-R, when sold by Amazon.com.  Learn more   What's this?
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Special Interests
['Product Description', '2-DVD set', "“You didn’t come to ‘get it done'. You came for the thrill of the ride.”", 'New questions on\xa0: staying positive around a negative friend, why bad things can happen when you’re feeling good, death\xa0- of\xa0- a\xa0- child issues, she’s lost her trust in men, why are we all here, do we ultimately pay for harming others? And – how to hear your own Inner Voice!', 'Plus: Abraham issues a call-out to society:\xa0 “To the leaders of your world, to the leaders of your organizations, to the doctors and scientists and psychologists and psychiatrists, to the teachers… to anyone who wants to help anyone…”\xa0– Abraham delivers!', 'About the Actor', 'All your power is in your Now. And what Now is the reason that Now is Now its whole power and potential is that Now is where you meet You. It is where the vibration of your current offering and the vibration of You, meet. And your emotions tell you how the meeting is going.\xa0 For tons of free material along with the latest books, CDs,\xa0and DVDs, visit their website.']
{'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.56 x 5.38 x 7.45 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Director': 'Jerry Hicks', 'Media Format': 'NTSC', 'Run time': '3 hours and 20 minutes', 'Release date': 'April 15, 2010', 'Actors': 'Esther Hicks, Jerry Hicks', 'Studio': 'Hay House', 'Number of discs': '2'}
I enjoyed it very much. The meditations were great and I was able to do them easily. Very helpful. I hope Amazon gets more in soon, I have people I want to send it to.
Great I loved it.

I am not a fan of Jack Nicholson but this movie was a mystery. It had you guessing exactly what was going on till the end. I can't remember the other movie, not sure I watched it. Would recommend The Terror if you like oldies and Jack Nicholson. Boris Karloff is always great.

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

The user maintains a strong passion for self-help and personal development, focusing on positive thinking and the Law of Attraction. Their evolving taste in cinema reflects a growing demand for engaging storytelling, evidenced by a more critical stance towards films that do not capture their interest. Recently, they've explored light-hearted narratives, particularly in the mystery genre, seeking a blend of nostalgia and compelling plots.

Their enthusiasm for atmospheric science fiction and horror remains, complemented by a discerning eye for narratives that challenge and intrigue. While they exhibit openness to various genres, their experiences suggest a desire for higher-quality storytelling and pacing. The user's latest interactions indicate a willingness to explore new series, though with an acknowledgment of pacing and humor variances.

Community engagement and a commitment to spiritual growth and mindfulness are integral to their pursuits, prioritizing content that resonates emotionally. They seek films that provide both enjoyment and relaxation, alongside their established interests in personal development. This nuanced approach to cinematic exploration highlights a balance between emotional engagement and lighter entertainment. Overall, the user's recent preferences illustrate an adaptive appreciation for cinema that marries nostalgia with a critical eye, aiming for enjoyable narratives that cater to both their entertainment needs and personal growth journey.
